title: Manage the Summer Internship Program
description: The university recruiting team is managing the application and selection process for the summer internship program.

tasks.description: Create and post all internship requisitions.
tasks.expected_outcome: Team creates requisitions for all available intern roles.

tasks.description: Review applications and conduct interviews to select the final candidates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Team screens, interviews, and selects a cohort of summer interns.

tasks.description: Send offer letters to the selected interns and manage their onboarding process.
tasks.expected_outcome: Team successfully hires and onboards all interns for the program.
